price: Naye akawaapia: Kwa yakini mimi ni miongoni wa wanao kunasihini.
footnotes: Naye akawaapia kuwa ati yeye ni katika wanao wapa nasaha njema, na akakariri kiapo chake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

translations: And he swore (to) both of them
